scene.option: What do you think of that other dog we've got on board, Val?

scene.name: hound

came along with that old man drinking up all your beer.

scene.option: I'd like to try my hand at mushroom hunting. I bet I'd be pretty good at it.

scene.option: So — could you fit in the sidecar?
